name: ConTellus
description:
Get ready to fight for survival!
As the last of ConTelli, you have the incredible ability to connect yourself with power cells and draw energy from them!!
But beware of the enemy warships - they wish to destroy all connections between you, the grounded might, and each little isle of power!
Amass as much power as possible by increasing the number of bonds between the tiles and survive as long as possible!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Click between two tiles to place a connection and combine their bonuses! (A single connection costs 100 points)

Remember that tiles need to be connected to at least a single power cell in order to grant their powers!

Possible bonuses:
HP Regen
Multishot
Attack Speed Up
Damage Up
Movement Speed Up
